articles.description: The variability and abundance of gut bacteria are associated with several early risk markers of Parkinson’s disease, particularly those related to motor impairments and constipation, study finds. Future studies investigating the impact of gut bacteria composi…
articles.content:
The variability and abundance of gut bacteria are associated with several early risk markers of Parkinsons disease, particularly those related to motor impairments and constipation, study finds.
